scripts.install: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.test: npm test --prefix client && npm test --prefix server
scripts.build: npm run server-build && npm run client-build
scripts.deploy: npm install && git checkout master && npm test && deployBranch=deploy-`""date +%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M""`&& git checkout master -b $deployBranch && sed -i .bak -e 1d server/.gitignore && npm run build && cp server/package.prod.json server/dist/package.json &&  git add . && git commit -m 'build deploy folder' && git push -u origin HEAD && git subtree push --prefix server/dist heroku master || git push heroku `git subtree split --prefix server/dist $deployBranch`:master --force && git checkout master
